title: 3 BD/1.5 BA in Lakeview/ Wrigleyville! Heat/gas/water incl.
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
- Three BR in the heart of Lakeview for $1950/month
- 1 Block to Red/Brown/Purple line trains at Belmont and buses in all directions
- Close to many lively restaurants, bars, and shops in this popular neighborhood
- 1/2 mile south of Wrigley Field, west of the Lakefront, and north of Lincoln Park
For more information, or to schedule a showing, please call 773-929-6007 and reference that you are interested in unit #301 at 3205 N. Clark and your desired move in date.
Leave a call back number for response.
